title: Grow East Asia, Grow Cardano
description: どうすれば東アジアのカルダノエコシステムを包括的かつ支持的に成長させることができるか？アフリカで行っているのと同じ方法で、集中的に取り組みます。

f6_assessments.q0: Hmm, there is a reason that the focus is on Africa. That's where the population will triple. What happens in Africa can decide the faith of the world: whether to succumb to the same mistakes done in the industrialized world or to leap over that into a sustainable future. I would not say the same about any other region in the world because everywhere else there's so much technological debt and they don't have this boost in population happening anymore. At the same time, limiting this to East Asia doesn't make sense. How about populous and innovative India in South Asia? How about Australia and Oceania? Nah, I think it's wise to focus now in Africa. Suggested reading: Factfulness by Hans Rosling.
f6_assessments.q1: We can drive ALL of the Fund 7 challenges in East Asia. We don't need a separate challenge for this.
f6_assessments.q2: Rather than copypasting challenges, let's implement some of them fully, with the focus in Africa. Let's then create a proper retrospect event and learn from the mistakes made and successes achieved. Then we can start taking those learning points to other regions of the world. I have 22 years of experience in both business and nonprofit world and I've seen it too many times: great initiatives fall when they lose focus. Strategy is about making choices. And one of the choices is to decide what we are not going to do (right now).

f6_assessments.q0: East Asia will undoubtedly be a source of talent and innovation for Cardano, a Grow East Asia campaign makes a lot of sense.
f6_assessments.q1: The budget seems appropriate and the requirements are solely based on location so I don't forsee a shortage of quality proposals from the community.
f6_assessments.q2: Some of the given metrics are easier to measure than others, but many are included. It is uncertain weather the proposers were able to establish a challenge team but they did have this intention. A challenge team would help with the verifiability of success.

importance: カルダノのコミュニティは、北米とヨーロッパを中心に活動しています。他の地域での成長には、コミュニティとしてのサポートとイニシアチブが必要です。
success: アジア全域、そしてアジアにつながる幅広い人々が集まり、チームを結成して、エコシステムを成長させています。
